ModMetadata.Name: [BETA] Stationpedia Extension
ModMetadata.Author: JonasVerzockt
ModMetadata.Description:
[h1]Stationpedia Extension[/h1] [h2]Export from the German translation Mod[/h2] [h3]This modification provides an extension of Stationpedia in English![/h3] Current version: [b]v0.0.2[/b]
[hr][/hr] [h3]How do I install this translation?[/h3] [olist] [*] Subscribe to this mod. [*] Start the game. [*] Make sure that this mod is above the core! [*] Set the game to english! [*] Restart the game! [/olist]
[hr][/hr] [b]ATTENTION! THIS IS CURRENTLY STILL A BETA AND HEAVILY UNDER DEVELOPMENT! MY NATIVE LANGUAGE IS NOT ENGLISH! SORRY FOR POSSIBLE GAMATICAL ERRORS![/b]
[hr][/hr] [b]Added/changed current help pages:[/b]
Melting Basics of metal processing General metal processing Advanced metal processing Mining Advanced mining Mining strategy Combustion gases Colors
[hr][/hr] The pages are from the following mod: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3032318024]German translation[/url] [url=https://ko-fi.com/jonasverzockt]Ko-fi Donation[/url]
Credit: [b][zynischerboomer][/b] - The idea guru who expanded the description ocean with his brilliant ideas. Not to mention the masterpieces of help articles you've polished up. [b][rogerwatersx][/b] - The visionary who was there from the beginning and even pulled facts out of a hat! Your inspiration made the project bigger.
